data.title: Marana Unified School District 6
data.text:
Your web browser does not support the <video> tag.

Our Neighborhood Schools

Register for Fall 2024-25 enrollment at your Marana school, where students receive the highest quality, comprehensive curriculum in safe, innovative, & award-winning learning environments.

Enroll Today

Your web browser does not support the <video> tag.

Building Skills for Life

Award-winning Career and Technical Education programs to prepare students to enter the workforce with the academic and career skills needed to compete successfully in the job market.

Explore High School CTE Classes

On Wednesday, July 24 , Donate School Supplies to Support Marana Schools at the KVOA News 4 Tucson Back to School Supply Drive hosted at DeGrazia Elementary!

Read More about KVOA News 4 School Supply Drive: July 24!

Marana students may be eligible for free or reduced-price meals. We encourage families to fill this out for assistance in 2024!

Read More about Apply Now for Free or Reduced-Price Meals

Beginning July 22, you can verify your student(s) for the 2024-25 school year and complete annual back-to-school paperwork online!

Read More about 2024-25 Back-to-School Paperwork & Verification Open!

Join us for our annual Back to School Resource Fair for backpacks, school supplies, community resources and a vaccine clinic!

Read More about MUSD Back-to-School Backpack & Resource Fair: July 27

The 2340 Foundation is hosting its 11th Annual Golf Classic benefitting MUSD students! Join us on Sept. 20 for a fun day of golf! Sign up online to participate.

Read More about Marana Schools’ 2340 Foundation 11th Annual Golf Classic

This is to advise you that on November 28, 2024 the Marana Unified School District will destroy all special education data and information on students who have been in special education programs and who were born during the year 2000.

Read More about Destruction of Information

Congratulations to Dezmen Roebuck, MHS Class of 2025, who committed to the University of Washington to continue his football career and education!

Read More about MHS Football Star Commits to University of Washington

Congratulations to former Marana Schools student and BMX athlete Daleny Vaughn who will be heading to Paris for the 2024 Summer Olympics!

Read More about MUSD Student Competes in Summer Olympics!

We love celebrating our Class of 2024 grads at our three high schools, and we have access to professional photos! View or download images from the ceremonies.

Read More about View & Download Class of 2024 Graduation Photos!

Students from the Marana High School Welding Program and local artist Trevor O’Tool are working on an aviation-themed art sculpture that will be installed near the Marana Regional Airport main entrance.

Read More about MHS Welders Creating Public Art Welded Sculpture
